Message:
The Witch Corps—
that’s what we were called.

We were also known as the
North’s strongest unit during
the Third Galian Civil War.

Oh yes, we were strong—
so strong, no one else
even came close.

Outcasts of no value who
were born as witches...
myself included.

That’s the kind of lot
that was assembled together.

So, everything
was a first for me.

Meeting comrades who
I knew had my back,

and being rewarded
for being a witch.

Back then, a bond thicker
than blood, deeper than
anyone else could ever
understand...undeniably
tied us to one another.

They were everything to me...
so I took this pistol,
and planted a bullet
into each of them.
